sentences.english: The paper published an extra to announce the end of the war.

sentences.english: The extra edition is a kind of the valuable paper media.

sentences.english: They want to print in some extra information.
sentences.chinese: 他們想要印入一些號外消息。

sentences.english: Extra is a piece of special newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 本文是對我國報紙號外發展歷程的研究。
